entries.name: food_bread
entries.text: A freshly baked loaf of bread. It has a soft crust and a slightly cakey crumb.

entries.name: food_coffee
entries.text: A hot cup of coffee. It's a dark roast with a chocolatey flavour. Some might think it almost tastes burnt.

entries.name: food_milk
entries.text: Fresh milk in a white paper carton. Somehow rich and refreshing all at once.

entries.name: food_soup
entries.text: Piping hot soup. Excellent in sickness or in health.

entries.name: food_salad
entries.text: A crisp fresh salad with just enough dressing. It's even got toasted pumpkin seeds.

entries.name: food_sausage
entries.text: Sausages grilled on a skewer. The casing is snappy and gives way to a meaty interior.

entries.name: food_curry_green
entries.text: A hot curry that tastes of coconut and green chili.

entries.name: food_curry_red
entries.text: A deep red curry with a warming heat behind it.

entries.name: food_pad_ka_prow
entries.text: Perfectly browned ground meat with wisps of basil over rice. It's got everything, even an egg.

entries.name: food_pill_vig
entries.text: A bitter pill that will reinvigorate you.

entries.name: food_pill_foc
entries.text: A bitter pill that will sharpen your focus.

entries.name: food_pill_spi
entries.text: A bitter pill that will raise your spirits.

entries.name: food_cigs
entries.text: They're awful for you. Where did you even find these?

entries.name: book_1
entries.text: Nothing is yours. It is to use. It is to share. If you will not share it, you cannot use it.

entries.name: book_2
entries.text: Go to bed; tired is stupid.

entries.name: book_3
entries.text: There is no greater opportunity for appreciating beauty than through its use in our everyday lives.

entries.name: book_4
entries.text: The desire for purified identity is a state of absolute bondage to the status quo.

entries.name: book_5
entries.display_name: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs
entries.text: The programmer must seek both perfection of part and adequacy of collection.

entries.name: book_6
entries.text: Now I am going to destroy my heart myself, and pour my blood into your veins.

entries.name: toy_duck
entries.text: A rubber ducky. Squeeze it to see if it makes a noise.

entries.name: toy_baseball
entries.text: White leather is pulled perfectly taut over its core. Its red stitching gleams softly.

entries.name: toy_basketball
entries.text: It bounces instantly up from the floor. The smell of fresh rubber.

entries.name: toy_golf
entries.text: Just by looking at it you can hear the crack of the club's contact.

entries.name: toy_puzzle
entries.text: If you touch it, you'll start looking for a place to put it.

entries.name: mask
entries.text: This mask can protect you from some, but certainly not all, airborne risks.

entries.name: prop_eth_farm
entries.text: Though dormant now, it is clearly a fine machine. Nothing made so well can be useless for long.

entries.name: prop_uv_lamp
entries.text: Its ghostly light will banish airborne pathogens.

entries.name: prop_purifier
entries.text: It processes the air around you, leaving it cleaner than before.

entries.name: prop_coffeemaker
entries.text: It is simple to use and produces serviceable coffee. Its gentle sound colours your mornings.

entries.name: prop_fan_classic
entries.text: Not state of the art, but tried and true. A vision of relief in summer.

entries.name: prop_fan_modern
entries.text: A rather advanced fan. Popular with those who seek to understand air.

entries.name: prop_lantern
entries.text: A sturdy but finely wrought lantern. Its light spills over its metalwork.

entries.name: prop_laptop
entries.text: A surprisingly sturdy laptop. It invites you to fill it with software.

entries.name: prop_chess
entries.text: A beautiful chess set with polished pieces. Your critter is smart, but can it really use this?

entries.name: prop_table_mahogany
entries.text: A sturdy table. Its top looks like it can stand up to anything.

entries.name: prop_table_walnut
entries.text: A sturdy table. Its top looks like it can stand up to anything.

entries.name: prop_table_plastic
entries.text: Perfect for a lawn party or a snack spread.

entries.name: prop_table_plastic_alt
entries.text: Its shape is imposing.

entries.name: prop_table_sm_mahogany
entries.text: A sturdy little table. It would make for a good nightstand.

entries.name: prop_table_sm_walnut
entries.text: A sturdy little table. It would make for a good nightstand.

entries.name: prop_table_sm_walnut_alt
entries.text: A sturdy little table. It would make for a good nightstand.

entries.name: prop_table_sm_plastic
entries.text: A sturdy little table. It would make for a good nightstand.

entries.name: prop_table_sm_plastic_alt
entries.text: A sturdy little table. It would make for a good nightstand.

entries.name: prop_chair_mahogany
entries.text: It can support the critter's whole weight. And surprisingly, it's really comfortable.

entries.name: prop_chair_stone
entries.text: It can support the critter's whole weight. And surprisingly, it's really comfortable.

entries.name: prop_stool_plastic
entries.text: Good for standing on if you need to get snacks out of the cabinet.

entries.name: prop_stool_wood
entries.text: Good for standing on if you need to get snacks out of the cabinet.

entries.name: prop_stool_stone
entries.text: Good for standing on if you need to get snacks out of the cabinet.

entries.name: prop_stool_gold
entries.text: Good for standing on if you need to get snacks out of the cabinet. And it's gold.

entries.name: prop_bowl_stone
entries.text: A smooth bowl with decent heft. It will keep your meal standing still.

entries.name: prop_bowl_gold
entries.text: A smooth bowl with decent heft. It will keep your meal standing still.

entries.name: prop_vase_stone
entries.text: It can hold a lot more than flowers. Why not put oil or wax in it?

entries.name: prop_vase_gold
entries.text: It can hold a lot more than flowers. Why not put oil or wax in it?

entries.name: prop_vase_grey
entries.text: It can hold a lot more than flowers. Why not put oil or wax in it?

entries.name: prop_vase_mahogany
entries.text: It can hold a lot more than flowers. Why not put oil or wax in it?

entries.name: prop_vase_walnut
entries.text: It can hold a lot more than flowers. Why not put oil or wax in it?

entries.name: prop_succulent
entries.text: Small but lively, this succulent does a surprising amount for the atmosphere of your living space.

entries.name: prop_bush_plain
entries.text: A classic bush. It's quite green.

entries.name: prop_bush_daisy
entries.text: A floral take on the classic bush. Its white accents are eye-catching.

entries.name: prop_bush_lilac
entries.text: A floral take on the classic bush. Its purple accents are eye-catching.

entries.name: prop_plant_plain
entries.text: It stands tall and proud for something that cannot live past the edges of a pot.

entries.name: prop_plant_maroon
entries.text: Look closely at the vivid colour of its trunk. It is subtle but striking.

entries.name: prop_plant_lilac
entries.text: Its purple flowers are a welcome pop of colour at any time of year.

entries.name: prop_plant_daisy
entries.text: Its bright white flowers are oddly dazzling. They almost don't belong inside.

entries.name: prop_vig_flower
entries.text: This flower is a symbol of strength. It blooms full when times are good.

entries.name: prop_foc_flower
entries.text: This flower is a symbol of wisdom. It blooms full when times are good.

entries.name: prop_spi_flower
entries.text: This flower is a symbol of fulfillment. It blooms full when times are good.

entries.name: prop_crystal_blue
entries.text: Nobody is quite sure of this crystal's rarity. Its value comes purely from its beauty.

entries.name: prop_crystal_green
entries.text: Nobody is quite sure of this crystal's rarity. Its value comes purely from its beauty.

entries.name: prop_crystal_purple
entries.text: Nobody is quite sure of this crystal's rarity. Its value comes purely from its beauty.

entries.name: prop_effigy_blue
entries.text: Art wrought by some unknown civilization, not of the past but of the future.

entries.name: prop_effigy_purple
entries.text: Art wrought by some unknown civilization, not of the past but of the future.

entries.name: prop_effigy_sea
entries.text: Art wrought by some unknown civilization, not of the past but of the future.

entries.name: prop_pixel
entries.text: Pixel 63118 of 76800. Rank: Sergeant First Class.

entries.name: prop_padkaprow
entries.text: A feast for the eyes, but nothing more.

entries.name: prop_bowl_grey
entries.text: A smooth bowl with decent heft. It will keep your meal standing still.

entries.name: prop_bowl_mahogany
entries.text: A smooth bowl with decent heft. It will keep your meal standing still.

entries.name: prop_bowl_walnut
entries.text: A smooth bowl with decent heft. It will keep your meal standing still.

entries.name: prop_chair_plastic
entries.text: It can support the critter's whole weight. And surprisingly, it's really comfortable.

entries.name: prop_plant_corn
entries.text: Though it doesn't yet produce vegetables, it may still be handy to keep around.

entries.name: prop_chicken
entries.text: An exceptionally round bird. Not food, but a dear friend.

entries.name: prop_mine
entries.text: You disarmed this one yourself. Good work.

entries.name: toy_laser_pointer
entries.text: All CATs love to chase a laser pointer.

entries.name: fish_grade_0
entries.text: A fish of decent but unremarkable quality.

entries.name: fish_grade_1
entries.text: A fish of notable quality.

entries.name: fish_grade_2
entries.text: An astounding catch.

entries.name: food_bagel
entries.text: Perfectly chewy with a slightly glossy exterior.

entries.name: food_bananas
entries.text: Nature's perfect dessert. And packed with potassium to boot!

entries.name: food_barley_tea
entries.text: More delicious than water and more refreshing than coffee.

entries.name: food_carrots
entries.text: The critter has the shape of an animal that would love carrots.

entries.name: food_congee
entries.text: An strong foundation of rice porridge loaded with flavourful add-ons.

entries.name: food_donut
entries.text: Dough fried golden brown, topped with sweet crackling icing. Cake or classic, take your pick.

entries.name: food_egg
entries.text: An egg.

entries.name: food_green_tea
entries.text: It's somehow always the right temperature. Perfectly bitter.

entries.name: food_oranges
entries.text: The smell of citrus wafts off of them. You can tell they are sweet just at a glance.

entries.name: food_persimmons
entries.text: Just ripe enough to eat, and sweet as candy. Don't eat too many or you'll get a bezoar.

entries.name: food_soda
entries.text: Sugary and fizzy and strongly flavoured. Drink it cold on a hot day.

entries.name: food_strange_meal
entries.text: What could this possibly be? Do you think it tastes good?

entries.name: food_bento
entries.text: Crispy fried shrimp with a moderate helping of rice and a variety of sides.

entries.name: food_burger
entries.text: It's as classic as can be. The toppings and the bun don't outshine the patty itself.

entries.name: food_dumplings
entries.text: Steamed dumplings filled with minced pork and aromatic vegetables. The skin's texture is ideal.

entries.name: food_empanadas
entries.text: Toasty flaky dough covering a richly spiced meat filling. It's hard to stop at a couple.

entries.name: food_hotdog
entries.text: It's something you might get at a backyard BBQ. It's got the right amount of char.

entries.name: food_ramen
entries.text: Hot rich broth and just barely toothsome noodles. You look forward to it after a long night.

entries.name: food_raw_meat
entries.text: It's good meat, no more and no less. Don't forget that your critter is an animal.

entries.name: food_salmon
entries.text: A beautiful salmon. Its eyes are bright and clear and its scales glitter.

entries.name: food_tuna
entries.text: Catafalqued king of my own ocean.

entries.name: food_beef_noodles
entries.text: Chewy noodles loaded with tender beef. The smell is divine.

entries.name: food_nasi_lemak
entries.text: The smell of coconut and pandan entices you to have a bite of rice loaded with sides.

entries.name: coin
entries.text: A gleaming golden coin. The possibilities for its use are endless.

entries.name: prop_portal_orange
entries.text: If you enter this one...

entries.name: prop_portal_blue
entries.text: ...you'll come out the other side!

entries.name: prop_xen_crystal
entries.text: Its label says GG-3883. Can't hurt to keep it around for now.

entries.name: prop_hoopy
entries.text: Does this one look like glados_debris_05 or glados_gib_10 to you?

entries.name: save_migrate_mark
entries.text: Commemorates a great leap forward.

entries.name: save_reset_mark
entries.text: Commemorates starting over fresh.

entries.name: save_extend_mark
entries.text: Commemorates incremental progress.
